segments.text: I see the boy’s determination; he wants those cookies, and nothing will stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little face is lit with excitement, and I can’t help but smile at his tenacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance back at the woman, and it feels like a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water, or the potential disaster brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s wrapped in a bubble of domestic bliss, while chaos builds around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those two—it’s a dangerous game they’re playing, a secret mission of sorts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how risky this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR
